original: Majjhima Nikāya 108
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Gopakamoggallānasutta
analyzed: gopaka moggallāna sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā ānando rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe aciraparinibbute bhagavati.
analyzed: ekam samayam āyasmai ānandaḥ rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe acira parinibbute bhagavati

original: Tena kho pana samayena rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto rājagahaṁ paṭisaṅkhārāpeti rañño pajjotassa āsaṅkamāno.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena rājā māgadhaḥ ajātasattu vedehiputto rājagaham paṭisaṅkhārāpeti raññaḥ pajjotassa āsaṅkamānaḥ

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya rājagahaṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmai ānandaḥ pubbaṇhasamayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya rājagaham piṇḍāya pāvisi

original: Atha kho āyasmato ānandassa etadahosi:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmataḥ ānandassa etat ahosi

original: “atippago kho tāva rājagahe piṇḍāya carituṁ.
analyzed: atippago kho tāva rājagahe piṇḍāya caritu

original: Yannūnāhaṁ yena gopakamoggallānassa brāhmaṇassa kammanto, yena gopakamoggallāno brāhmaṇo tenupasaṅkameyyan”ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham yena gopakamoggallānassa brāhmaṇassa kammantaḥ yena gopakamoggallānaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ tena upasaṅkameyyanti

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena gopakamoggallānassa brāhmaṇassa kammanto, yena gopakamoggallāno brāhmaṇo tenupasaṅkami.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmai ānandaḥ yena gopakamoggallānassa brāhmaṇassa kammantaḥ yena gopakamoggallānaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ tena upasaṅkami

original: Addasā kho gopakamoggallāno brāhmaṇo āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ.
analyzed: addasā kho gopakamoggallānaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ āyasmantam ānandam dūratas u āgacchanta

original: Disvāna āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: disvānaḥ āyasmantam ānandam etat avoca

original: “etu kho bhavaṁ ānando.
analyzed: etu khalu bhavam ānandaḥ

original: Svāgataṁ bhoto ānandassa.
analyzed: svāgatam bhoto ānandassa

original: Cirassaṁ kho bhavaṁ ānando imaṁ pariyāyamakāsi yadidaṁ idhāgamanāya.
analyzed: cirassam kho bhavam ānandaḥ imam pariyāyam akāsi yat idam idha āgamanāya

original: Nisīdatu bhavaṁ ānando, idamāsanaṁ paññattan”ti.
analyzed: nisīdatu bhavam ānandaḥ idam āsanam paññattanti

original: Nisīdi kho āyasmā ānando paññatte āsane.
analyzed: nisīdi kho āyasmai ānando paññatte āsane

original: Gopakamoggallānopi kho brāhmaṇo aññataraṁ nīcaṁ āsanaṁ gahetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: gopakamoggallānaḥ api kho brāhmaṇaḥ aññataram nīcam āsanam gahetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho gopakamoggallāno brāhmaṇo āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu gopakamoggallānaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ āyasmantam ānandam etat avoca

original: “atthi nu kho, bho ānanda, ekabhikkhupi tehi dhammehi sabbenasabbaṁ sabbathāsabbaṁ samannāgato yehi dhammehi samannāgato so bhavaṁ gotamo ahosi arahaṁ sammāsambuddho”ti?
analyzed: atthi nu kho bho ānanda eka bhikkhu pi tehi dhammehi sabbena sabbam sabbathā sabbam samannāgataḥ yehi dhammehi samannāgataḥ saḥ bhavam gotamaḥ ahosi araham sammāsambuddhaḥ iti

original: “Natthi kho, brāhmaṇa, ekabhikkhupi tehi dhammehi sabbenasabbaṁ sabbathāsabbaṁ samannāgato yehi dhammehi samannāgato so bhagavā ahosi arahaṁ sammāsambuddho.
analyzed: natthi kho brāhmaṇaḥ eka bhikkhu pi tehi dhammehi sabbena sabbam sabbathā sabbam samannāgataḥ yehi dhammehi samannāgataḥ saḥ bhagavā ahosi araham sammāsambuddho

original: So hi, brāhmaṇa, bhagavā anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā, asañjātassa maggassa sañjanetā, anakkhātassa maggassa akkhātā, maggaññū, maggavidū, maggakovido;
analyzed: saḥ hi brāhmaṇa bhagavā anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā a sañjātassa maggassa sañjanetā an akkhātassa maggassa akkhātā maggaññū magga vidū magga kovidaḥ

original: maggānugā ca pana etarahi sāvakā viharanti pacchā samannāgatā”ti.
analyzed: magga anugā ca pana etarahi sāvakāḥ viharanti pacchā samannāgatā ati

original: Ayañca hidaṁ āyasmato ānandassa gopakamoggallānena brāhmaṇena saddhiṁ antarākathā vippakatā ahosi.
analyzed: ayam ca hidam āyasmataḥ ānandassa gopakamoggallānena brāhmaṇena saddhim antarākathā vippakatā ahosi

original: Atha kho vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto rājagahe kammante anusaññāyamāno yena
analyzed: atha kho vassakāraḥ brāhmaṇaḥ magadha mahāmattaḥ rājagahe kammante anusaññāyamānaḥ yena

original: gopakamoggallānassa brāhmaṇassa kammanto, yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā
analyzed: gopakamoggallānassa brāhmaṇassa kammantaḥ yena ayasmai ānandaḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā

original: āyasmatā ānandena saddhiṁ sammodi.
analyzed: āyasmatā ānandena saddhim sammodi

original: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: sammodanīyam katham sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho vassakāraḥ brāhmaṇaḥ magadha mahāmattaḥ āyasmantam ānandam etat avoca

original: “kāya nuttha, bho ānanda, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā, kā ca pana vo antarākathā vippakatā”ti?
analyzed: kāya nuttha bho ānanda etarahi kathāya sannisinnā kā ca pana vaḥ antarākathā vippakatā ati

original: “Idha maṁ, brāhmaṇa, gopakamoggallāno brāhmaṇo evamāha:
analyzed: idha ma brāhmaṇa gopakamoggallānaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ evam āha

original: ‘atthi nu kho, bho ānanda, ekabhikkhupi tehi dhammehi sabbenasabbaṁ sabbathāsabbaṁ samannāgato yehi dhammehi samannāgato so bhavaṁ gotamo ahosi arahaṁ sammāsambuddho’ti.
analyzed: atthi nu kho bho ānanda eka bhikkhu pi tehi dhammehi sabbena sabbam sabbathā sabbam samannāgataḥ yehi dhammehi samannāgataḥ saḥ bhavam gotamaḥ ahosi araham sammāsambuddhaḥ iti

original: Evaṁ vutte, ahaṁ, brāhmaṇa, gopakamoggallānaṁ brāhmaṇaṁ etadavocaṁ:
analyzed: evam vutte aha brāhmaṇa gopakamoggallānam brāhmaṇam etat avoca

original: ‘natthi kho, brāhmaṇa, ekabhikkhupi tehi dhammehi sabbenasabbaṁ sabbathāsabbaṁ samannāgato yehi dhammehi samannāgato so bhagavā ahosi arahaṁ sammāsambuddho.
analyzed: natthi kho brāhmaṇaḥ eka bhikkhu pi tehi dhammehi sabbena sabbam sabbathā sabbam samannāgataḥ yehi dhammehi samannāgataḥ saḥ bhagavā ahosi araham sammāsambuddho

original: So hi, brāhmaṇa, bhagavā anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā, asañjātassa maggassa sañjanetā, anakkhātassa maggassa akkhātā, maggaññū, maggavidū, maggakovido;
analyzed: saḥ hi brāhmaṇa bhagavā anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā a sañjātassa maggassa sañjanetā an akkhātassa maggassa akkhātā maggaññū magga vidū magga kovidaḥ

original: maggānugā ca pana etarahi sāvakā viharanti pacchā samannāgatā’ti.
analyzed: magga anugā ca pana etarahi sāvakāḥ viharanti pacchā samannāgatā ati

original: Ayaṁ kho no, brāhmaṇa, gopakamoggallānena brāhmaṇena saddhiṁ antarākathā vippakatā.
analyzed: ayam khalu naḥ brāhmaṇa gopakamoggallānena brāhmaṇena saddhim antarākathā vippaka tā

original: Atha tvaṁ anuppatto”ti.
analyzed: atha tvam anuppatto ti

original: “Atthi nu kho, bho ānanda, ekabhikkhupi tena bhotā gotamena ṭhapito:
analyzed: atthi nu kho bho ānanda tena bhotā gotamena ṭhapito

original: ‘ayaṁ vo mamaccayena paṭisaraṇaṁ bhavissatī’ti, yaṁ tumhe etarahi paṭipādeyyāthā”ti?
analyzed: ayam vaḥ mamaccayena paṭisaraṇam bhavissati iti yam tumhe etarahi paṭipādeyyātha ati

original: “Natthi kho, brāhmaṇa, ekabhikkhupi tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena ṭhapito:
analyzed: natthi kho brāhmaṇaḥ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena ṭhapitaḥ

original: ‘ayaṁ vo mamaccayena paṭisaraṇaṁ bhavissatī’ti, yaṁ mayaṁ etarahi paṭipādeyyāmā”ti.
analyzed: ayam vaḥ mamaccayena paṭisaraṇam bhavissati iti yam mayam etarahi paṭipādeyyāma ati

original: “Atthi pana, bho ānanda, ekabhikkhupi saṅghena sammato, sambahulehi therehi bhikkhūhi ṭhapito:
analyzed: atthi pana bho ānanda saṅghena sammataḥ sambahulehi therehi bhikkhūhi ṭhapitaḥ

original: ‘ayaṁ no bhagavato accayena paṭisaraṇaṁ bhavissatī’ti, yaṁ tumhe etarahi paṭipādeyyāthā”ti?
analyzed: ayam naḥ bhagavataḥ accayena paṭisaraṇam bhavissati iti yam tumhe etarahi paṭipādeyyātha ati

original: “Natthi kho, brāhmaṇa, ekabhikkhupi saṅghena sammato, sambahulehi therehi bhikkhūhi ṭhapito:
analyzed: natthi kho brāhmaṇaḥ saṅghena sammataḥ sambahulehi therehi bhikkhūhi ṭhapito

original: ‘ayaṁ no bhagavato accayena paṭisaraṇaṁ bhavissatī’ti, yaṁ mayaṁ etarahi paṭipādeyyāmā”ti.
analyzed: ayam naḥ bhagavataḥ accayena paṭisaraṇam bhavissati iti yam mayam etarahi paṭipādeyyāma ati

original: “Evaṁ appaṭisaraṇe ca pana, bho ānanda, ko hetu sāmaggiyā”ti?
analyzed: evam a paṭisaraṇe ca pana bho ānanda kaḥ hetu sāmaggiyā ati

original: “Na kho mayaṁ, brāhmaṇa, appaṭisaraṇā;
analyzed: na kho maya brāhmaṇa appaṭisaraṇā

original: sappaṭisaraṇā mayaṁ, brāhmaṇa;
analyzed: sappaṭisaraṇā maya brāhmaṇa

original: dhammappaṭisaraṇā”ti.
analyzed: dhamma ppaṭisaraṇā ti

original: “‘Atthi nu kho, bho ānanda, ekabhikkhupi tena bhotā gotamena ṭhapito—
analyzed: atthi nu kho bho ānanda tena bhotā gotamena ṭhapito

original: ayaṁ vo mamaccayena paṭisaraṇaṁ bhavissatīti, yaṁ tumhe etarahi paṭipādeyyāthā’ti—
analyzed: ayam vaḥ mamaccayena paṭisaraṇam bhavissati iti yam tumhe etarahi paṭipādeyyātha ati

original: iti puṭṭho samāno ‘natthi kho, brāhmaṇa, ekabhikkhupi tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena ṭhapito—
analyzed: iti puṭṭhaḥ samānaḥ natthi kho brāhmaṇaḥ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena ṭhapitaḥ

original: ayaṁ vo mamaccayena paṭisaraṇaṁ bhavissatīti, yaṁ mayaṁ etarahi paṭipādeyyāmā’ti vadesi;
analyzed: ayam vaḥ mamaccayena paṭisaraṇam bhavissati iti yam mayam etarahi paṭipādeyyāma ati vadesi

original: ‘atthi pana, bho ānanda, ekabhikkhupi saṅghena sammato, sambahulehi therehi bhikkhūhi ṭhapito—
analyzed: atthi pana bho ānanda saṅghena sammataḥ sambahulehi therehi bhikkhūhi ṭhapitaḥ

original: ayaṁ no bhagavato accayena paṭisaraṇaṁ bhavissatīti, yaṁ tumhe etarahi paṭipādeyyāthā’ti—
analyzed: ayam naḥ bhagavataḥ accayena paṭisaraṇam bhavissati iti yam tumhe etarahi paṭipādeyyātha ati

original: iti puṭṭho samāno ‘natthi kho, brāhmaṇa, ekabhikkhupi saṅghena sammato, sambahulehi therehi bhikkhūhi ṭhapito—
analyzed: iti puṭṭhaḥ samānaḥ natthi kho brāhmaṇaḥ saṅghena sammataḥ sambahulehi therehi bhikkhūhi ṭhapitaḥ

original: ayaṁ no bhagavato accayena paṭisaraṇaṁ bhavissatīti, yaṁ mayaṁ etarahi paṭipādeyyāmā’ti—
analyzed: ayam naḥ bhagavataḥ accayena paṭisaraṇam bhavissati iti yam mayam etarahi paṭipādeyyāma ati

original: vadesi;
analyzed: vadesi

original: ‘evaṁ appaṭisaraṇe ca pana, bho ānanda, ko hetu sāmaggiyā’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘na kho mayaṁ, brāhmaṇa, appaṭisaraṇā;
analyzed: evam appaṭisaraṇe ca pana bho ānanda kaḥ hetu sāmaggiyā ati iti puṭṭhaḥ samānaḥ na kho brāhmaṇa appaṭisaraṇā

original: sappaṭisaraṇā mayaṁ, brāhmaṇa;
analyzed: sappaṭisaraṇā maya brāhmaṇa

original: dhammappaṭisaraṇā’ti vadesi.
analyzed: dhammappaṭisaraṇā ti vadesi

original: Imassa pana, bho ānanda, bhāsitassa kathaṁ attho daṭṭhabbo”ti?
analyzed: imassa pana bho ānanda bhāsitassa katham atthaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ ti

original: “Atthi kho, brāhmaṇa, tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ, pātimokkhaṁ uddiṭṭhaṁ.
analyzed: atthi kho brāhmaṇa tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena bhikkhūnam sikkhāpadam paññatta pātimokkham uddiṭṭha

original: Te mayaṁ tadahuposathe yāvatikā ekaṁ gāmakhettaṁ upanissāya viharāma te sabbe ekajjhaṁ sannipatāma;
analyzed: te mayam tadahuposathe yāvatikāḥ ekam gāma khettam upanissāya viharāma te sabbe ekajjham sannipatāma

original: sannipatitvā yassa taṁ pavattati taṁ ajjhesāma.
analyzed: sannipatitvā yassa tam pavattati tam ajjhesāma

original: Tasmiñce bhaññamāne hoti bhikkhussa āpatti hoti vītikkamo taṁ mayaṁ yathādhammaṁ yathānusiṭṭhaṁ kāremāti.
analyzed: tasmin ce bhaññamāne hoti bhikkhussa āpatti hoti vītikkamaḥ tam mayam yathādhammam yathānusiṭṭham kārema ati

original: Na kira no bhavanto kārenti;
analyzed: na kira naḥ bhavantaḥ kārenti

original: dhammo no kāreti”.
analyzed: dhammaḥ naḥ kāreti

original: “Atthi nu kho, bho ānanda, ekabhikkhupi yaṁ tumhe etarahi sakkarotha garuṁ karotha mānetha pūjetha; sakkatvā garuṁ katvā upanissāya viharathā”ti?
analyzed: atthi nu kho bho ānanda eka bhikkhu pi yam tumhe etarahi sakkarotha garum karotha mānetha pūjetha sakkatvā garum katvā upanissāya viharatha ati

original: “Natthi kho, brāhmaṇa, ekabhikkhupi yaṁ mayaṁ etarahi sakkaroma garuṁ karoma mānema pūjema; sakkatvā garuṁ katvā upanissāya viharāmā”ti.
analyzed: natthi kho brāhmaṇaḥ eka bhikkhu pi yam mayam etarahi sakkaroma garum karoma mānema pūjema sakkatvā garum katvā upanissāya viharāma ati

original: “‘Atthi nu kho, bho ānanda, ekabhikkhupi tena bhotā gotamena ṭhapito—
analyzed: atthi nu kho bho ānanda tena bhotā gotamena ṭhapito

original: ayaṁ vo mamaccayena paṭisaraṇaṁ bhavissatīti yaṁ tumhe etarahi paṭipādeyyāthā’ti—
analyzed: ayam vaḥ mamaccayena paṭisaraṇam bhavissati iti yam tumhe etarahi paṭipādeyyātha ati

original: iti puṭṭho samāno ‘natthi kho, brāhmaṇa, ekabhikkhupi tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena ṭhapito—
analyzed: iti puṭṭhaḥ samānaḥ natthi kho brāhmaṇaḥ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena ṭhapitaḥ

original: ayaṁ vo mamaccayena paṭisaraṇaṁ bhavissatīti yaṁ mayaṁ etarahi paṭipādeyyāmā’ti vadesi;
analyzed: ayam vaḥ mamaccayena paṭisaraṇam bhavissati iti yam mayam etarahi paṭipādeyyāma ati vadesi

original: ‘atthi pana, bho ānanda, ekabhikkhupi saṅghena sammato, sambahulehi therehi bhikkhūhi ṭhapito—
analyzed: atthi pana bho ānanda saṅghena sammataḥ sambahulehi therehi bhikkhūhi ṭhapitaḥ

original: ayaṁ no bhagavato accayena paṭisaraṇaṁ bhavissatīti yaṁ tumhe etarahi paṭipādeyyāthā’ti—
analyzed: ayam naḥ bhagavataḥ accayena paṭisaraṇam bhavissati iti yam tumhe etarahi paṭipādeyyātha ati

original: iti puṭṭho samāno ‘natthi kho, brāhmaṇa, ekabhikkhupi saṅghena sammato, sambahulehi therehi bhikkhūhi ṭhapito—
analyzed: iti puṭṭhaḥ samānaḥ natthi kho brāhmaṇaḥ saṅghena sammataḥ sambahulehi therehi bhikkhūhi ṭhapitaḥ

original: ayaṁ no bhagavato accayena paṭisaraṇaṁ bhavissatīti yaṁ mayaṁ etarahi paṭipādeyyāmā’ti vadesi;
analyzed: ayam naḥ bhagavataḥ accayena paṭisaraṇam bhavissati iti yam mayam etarahi paṭipādeyyāma ati vadesi

original: ‘atthi nu kho, bho ānanda, ekabhikkhupi yaṁ tumhe etarahi sakkarotha garuṁ karotha mānetha pūjetha; sakkatvā garuṁ katvā upanissāya viharathā’ti—
analyzed: atthi nu kho bho ānanda eka bhikkhu pi yam tumhe etarahi sakkarotha garum karotha mānetha pūjetha sakkatvā garum katvā upanissāya viharatha ati

original: iti puṭṭho samāno ‘natthi kho, brāhmaṇa, ekabhikkhupi yaṁ mayaṁ etarahi sakkaroma garuṁ karoma mānema pūjema; sakkatvā garuṁ katvā upanissāya viharāmā’ti vadesi.
analyzed: iti puṭṭhaḥ samānaḥ na atthi kho brāhmaṇaḥ eka bhikkhu pi yam mayam etarahi sakkaroma garum karoma mānema pūjema sakkatvā garum katvā upanissāya viharāma ati vadesi

original: Imassa pana, bho ānanda, bhāsitassa kathaṁ attho daṭṭhabbo”ti?
analyzed: imassa pana bho ānanda bhāsitassa katham atthaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ ti

original: “Atthi kho, brāhmaṇa, tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena dasa pasādanīyā dhammā akkhātā.
analyzed: atthi kho brāhmaṇa tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena dasa pasādanīyāḥ dhammāḥ akkhātā

original: Yasmiṁ no ime dhammā saṁvijjanti taṁ mayaṁ etarahi sakkaroma garuṁ karoma mānema pūjema; sakkatvā garuṁ katvā upanissāya viharāma.
analyzed: yasmin no ime dhammā savijjanti tam mayam etarahi sakkaroma garum karoma mānema pūjema sakkatvā garum katvā upanissāya viharāma

original: Katame dasa?
analyzed: katame dasa

original: Idha, brāhmaṇa, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti, pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno, aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu.
analyzed: idha brāhmaṇa bhikkhu sīlavā hoti pātimokkha savara savutaḥ viharati ācāra gocara sampannaḥ aṇumattesu vajjesu bhaya dassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu

original: Bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo.
analyzed: bahu sutaḥ hoti suta dharaḥ suta sannicayaḥ

original: Ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā, majjhekalyāṇā, pariyosānakalyāṇā, sātthaṁ, sabyañjanaṁ,
analyzed: ye te dhammā ādi kalyāṇā majjhe kalyāṇā pariyosāna kalyāṇā sā attha sa byañjana

original: kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ abhivadanti tathārūpāssa dhammā bahussutā
analyzed: kevala paripuṇṇam parisuddham brahmacariyam abhivadanti tathārūpāḥ sa dhammāḥ bahu sutā

original: honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.
analyzed: honti dhātā vacasā paricitāḥ manasā anupekkhitāḥ diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā

original: Santuṭṭho hoti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārehi.
analyzed: santuṭṭhaḥ hoti cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna ppaccaya bhesajja parikkhārehi

original: Catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī.
analyzed: catunnam jhānānam ābhicetasikānam diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihārānam nikāma lābhī hoti a kiccha lābhī a kasira lābhī

original: Anekavihitaṁ iddhividhaṁ paccanubhoti—ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti, bahudhāpi hutvā eko
analyzed: aneka vihitam iddhi vidham paccanubhoti ekaḥ api hutvā bahudhā hoti bahudhā api hutvā ekaḥ

original: hoti; āvibhāvaṁ tirobhāvaṁ; tirokuṭṭaṁ tiropākāraṁ tiropabbataṁ asajjamāno gacchati,
analyzed: hoti āvi bhāvam tiro bhāva tiro kuṭṭam tiro upākāram tiro pabbatam a sajjamānaḥ gacchati

original: seyyathāpi ākāse; pathaviyāpi ummujjanimujjaṁ karoti, seyyathāpi udake; udakepi abhijjamāne
analyzed: seyyathā api ākāse pathaviyā api ummujja nimujjam karoti seyyathā api udake udake api abhijjamāne

original: gacchati, seyyathāpi pathaviyaṁ; ākāsepi pallaṅkena kamati, seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇo;
analyzed: gacchati seyyathā api pathaviye ākāse pi pallaṅkena kamati seyyathā api pakkhī sakuṇaḥ

original: imepi candimasūriye evaṁmahiddhike evaṁmahānubhāve pāṇinā parimasati parimajjati,
analyzed: ime api candima sūriye eva mahiddhike eva mahā anubhāve pāṇinā parimasati parimajjati

original: yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṁ vatteti.
analyzed: yāva brahma lokā api kāyena vasam vatta iti

original: Dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkantamānusikāya ubho sadde suṇāti—dibbe ca mānuse ca, ye dūre santike ca.
analyzed: dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkanta mānusikāya ubho sadde suṇāti dibbe ca mānuse ca ye dūre santike ca

original: Parasattānaṁ parapuggalānaṁ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāti.
analyzed: para sattānam para puggalānam cetasā cetaḥ paricca pajānāti

original: Sarāgaṁ vā cittaṁ ‘sarāgaṁ cittan’ti pajānāti,
analyzed: sa rāgam vā cittam sa rāgam cittam iti pajānāti

original: vītarāgaṁ vā cittaṁ ‘vītarāgaṁ cittan’ti pajānāti,
analyzed: vīta rāgam vā cittam vīta rāgam cittam iti pajānāti

original: sadosaṁ vā cittaṁ ‘sadosaṁ cittan’ti pajānāti,
analyzed: sa dosam vā cittam sa dosam cittam iti pajānāti

original: vītadosaṁ vā cittaṁ ‘vītadosaṁ cittan’ti pajānāti,
analyzed: vīta dosam vā cittam vīta dosam cittam iti pajānāti

original: samohaṁ vā cittaṁ ‘samohaṁ cittan’ti pajānāti,
analyzed: sa moham vā cittam sa moham cittam iti pajānāti

original: vītamohaṁ vā cittaṁ ‘vītamohaṁ cittan’ti pajānāti,
analyzed: vīta moham vā cittam vīta moham cittam iti pajānāti

original: saṅkhittaṁ vā cittaṁ ‘saṅkhittaṁ cittan’ti pajānāti,
analyzed: saṅkhittam vā cittam saṅkhittam cittam iti pajānāti

original: vikkhittaṁ vā cittaṁ ‘vikkhittaṁ cittan’ti pajānāti,
analyzed: vikkhittam vā cittam vikkhittam cittam iti pajānāti

original: mahaggataṁ vā cittaṁ ‘mahaggataṁ cittan’ti pajānāti,
analyzed: mahaggatam vā cittam mahaggatam cittam iti pajānāti

original: amahaggataṁ vā cittaṁ ‘amahaggataṁ cittan’ti pajānāti,
analyzed: a mahaggatam vā cittam a mahaggatam cittam iti pajānāti

original: sauttaraṁ vā cittaṁ ‘sauttaraṁ cittan’ti pajānāti,
analyzed: sauttaram vā cittam sauttaram cittam iti pajānāti

original: anuttaraṁ vā cittaṁ ‘anuttaraṁ cittan’ti pajānāti,
analyzed: anuttaram vā cittam anuttaram cittam iti pajānāti

original: samāhitaṁ vā cittaṁ ‘samāhitaṁ cittan’ti pajānāti,
analyzed: samāhitam vā cittam samāhitam cittam iti pajānāti

original: asamāhitaṁ vā cittaṁ ‘asamāhitaṁ cittan’ti pajānāti,
analyzed: a samāhitam vā cittam a samāhitam cittam iti pajānāti

original: vimuttaṁ vā cittaṁ ‘vimuttaṁ cittan’ti pajānāti,
analyzed: vimuttam vā cittam vimuttam cittam iti pajānāti

original: avimuttaṁ vā cittaṁ ‘avimuttaṁ cittan’ti pajānāti.
analyzed: a vimuttam vā cittam a vimuttam cittam iti pajānāti

original: Anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarati, seyyathidaṁ—ekampi jātiṁ dvepi jātiyo tissopi
analyzed: aneka vihitam pubbenivāsam anussarati seyyathidam ekam pi jātim dve pi jātiyaḥ tissaḥ api

original: jātiyo catassopi jātiyo pañcapi jātiyo dasapi jātiyo vīsampi jātiyo tiṁsampi jātiyo
analyzed: jātiyo catasso pi jātiyaḥ pañca api jātiyaḥ dasa api jātiyaḥ vīsampi jātiyaḥ tisampi jātiyaḥ

original: cattārīsampi jātiyo paññāsampi jātiyo jātisatampi jātisahassampi jātisatasahassampi
analyzed: cattārīsam pi jātiyaḥ paññāsam pi jātiyaḥ jāti satam pi jāti sahassam pi jāti sata sahassam pi

original: anekepi saṁvaṭṭakappe anekepi vivaṭṭakappe anekepi saṁvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe: ‘amutrāsiṁ
analyzed: aneke api savaṭṭa kappe aneke api vivaṭṭa kappe aneke api savaṭṭa vivaṭṭa kappe amutra asi

original: evaṁnāmo evaṅgotto evaṁvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṁsukhadukkhappaṭisaṁvedī evamāyupariyanto,
analyzed: eva nāmaḥ evaṃgotto eva vaṇṇo evam āhāro eva sukha dukkha paṭisavedī evam āyu pariyanto

original: so tato cuto amutra udapādiṁ; tatrāpāsiṁ evaṁnāmo evaṅgotto evaṁvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṁsukhadukkhappaṭisaṁvedī
analyzed: saḥ tatas cutaḥ amutra udapādi tatra apāsim eva nāmaḥ evaṃgottaḥ eva vaṇṇo evam āhāraḥ eva sukha dukkha ppaṭisavedī

original: evamāyupariyanto, so tato cuto idhūpapanno’ti. Iti sākāraṁ sauddesaṁ anekavihitaṁ
analyzed: evam āyu pariyantaḥ saḥ tatas cutaḥ idhu upapanno ti iti sa ākāram sa uddesam aneka vihita

original: pubbenivāsaṁ anussarati.
analyzed: pubbenivāsam anussarati

original: Dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe, sugate duggate yathākammūpage satte pajānāti.
analyzed: dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkanta mānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate yathākammūpage satte pajānāti

original: Āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: āsavānam khayā anāsavam cetaḥ vimuttim paññā vimuttim diṭṭhe iva dhamme sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati

original: Ime kho, brāhmaṇa, tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena dasa pasādanīyā dhammā akkhātā.
analyzed: ime kho brāhmaṇa tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena dasa pasādanīyāḥ dhammāḥ akkhātā

original: Yasmiṁ no ime dhammā saṁvijjanti taṁ mayaṁ etarahi sakkaroma garuṁ karoma mānema pūjema; sakkatvā garuṁ katvā upanissāya viharāmā”ti.
analyzed: yasmin no ime dhammā savijjanti tam mayam etarahi sakkaroma garum karoma mānema pūjema sakkatvā garum katvā upanissāya viharāma ati

original: Evaṁ vutte, vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto upanandaṁ senāpatiṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: evam vutte vassakāraḥ brāhmaṇaḥ magadha mahāmattaḥ upanandam senāpatim āmantesi

original: “Taṁ kiṁ maññati bhavaṁ senāpati yadime bhonto sakkātabbaṁ sakkaronti, garuṁ kātabbaṁ garuṁ karonti,
analyzed: tam kim maññati bhavam senāpati yat ime bhonto sakkātabbam sakkaronti garum kātabbam garum karonti

original: mānetabbaṁ mānenti, pūjetabbaṁ pūjenti”?
analyzed: mānetabbam mānenti pūjetabbam pūjenti

original: “Tagghime bhonto sakkātabbaṁ sakkaronti, garuṁ kātabbaṁ garuṁ karonti, mānetabbaṁ mānenti, pūjetabbaṁ pūjenti.
analyzed: tat hi ime bhontaḥ sakkātabbam sakkaronti garum kātabbam garum karonti mānetabbam mānenti pūjetabbam pūjenti

original: Imañca hi te bhonto na sakkareyyuṁ na garuṁ kareyyuṁ na māneyyuṁ na pūjeyyuṁ;
analyzed: iman ca hi te bhontaḥ na sakkareyyum na garum kareyyum na māneyyum na pūjeyyu

original: atha kiñcarahi te bhonto sakkareyyuṁ garuṁ kareyyuṁ māneyyuṁ pūjeyyuṁ, sakkatvā garuṁ katvā mānetvā pūjetvā upanissāya vihareyyun”ti?
analyzed: atha kiñcarahi te bhonto sakkareyyum garum kareyyum māneyyum pūjeyyu sakkatvā garum katvā mānetvā pūjetvā upanissāya vihareyyunti

original: Atha kho vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho vassakāraḥ brāhmaṇaḥ magadha mahāmattaḥ āyasmantam ānandam etat avoca

original: “kahaṁ pana bhavaṁ ānando etarahi viharatī”ti?
analyzed: kaham pana bhavan ānandaḥ etarahi viharati iti

original: “Veḷuvane khohaṁ, brāhmaṇa, etarahi viharāmī”ti.
analyzed: veḷuvane kha uha brāhmaṇaḥ etarahi viharāmi iti

original: “Kacci pana, bho ānanda, veḷuvanaṁ ramaṇīyañceva appasaddañca appanigghosañca vijanavātaṁ manussarāhasseyyakaṁ paṭisallānasāruppan”ti?
analyzed: kacci pana bho ānanda veḷuvanam ramaṇīyam ca iva appasaddam ca appanigghosam ca vijana vātam manussa rāhasseyyakam paṭisallāna sāruppanti

original: “Taggha, brāhmaṇa, veḷuvanaṁ ramaṇīyañceva appasaddañca appanigghosañca vijanavātaṁ manussarāhasseyyakaṁ paṭisallānasāruppaṁ, yathā taṁ tumhādisehi rakkhakehi gopakehī”ti.
analyzed: tat ha brāhmaṇa veḷuvanam ramaṇīyañca iva appasaddañca appanigghosañca vijana vātam manussa rāhasseyyakam paṭisallāna sāruppa yathā tam tumhādisehi rakkhakehi gopakehi iti

original: “Taggha, bho ānanda, veḷuvanaṁ ramaṇīyañceva appasaddañca appanigghosañca vijanavātaṁ manussarāhasseyyakaṁ paṭisallānasāruppaṁ, yathā taṁ bhavantehi jhāyīhi jhānasīlīhi.
analyzed: tat ha bho ānanda veḷuvanam ramaṇīyam ca iva appasaddam ca appanigghosam ca vijana vātam manussa rāhasseyyakam paṭisallāna sāruppa yathā tam bhavantehi jhāyīhi jhāna sīlīhi

original: Jhāyino ceva bhavanto jhānasīlino ca.
analyzed: jhāyinaḥ ca iva bhavantaḥ jhānasīlinaḥ ca

original: Ekamidāhaṁ, bho ānanda, samayaṁ so bhavaṁ gotamo vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
analyzed: ekam id āha bho ānanda samayam saḥ bhavam gotamaḥ vesāliyam viharati mahā vane kūṭāgāra sālāya

original: Atha khvāhaṁ, bho ānanda, yena mahāvanaṁ kūṭāgārasālā yena so bhavaṁ gotamo tenupasaṅkamiṁ.
analyzed: atha khvā āha bho ānanda yena mahā vanam kūṭāgāra sālā yena saḥ bhavam gotamaḥ tena upasaṅkami

original: Tatra ca pana so bhavaṁ gotamo anekapariyāyena jhānakathaṁ kathesi.
analyzed: tatra ca pana saḥ bhavam gotamaḥ aneka pariyāyena jhāna katham kathesi

original: Jhāyī ceva so bhavaṁ gotamo ahosi jhānasīlī ca.
analyzed: jhāyī ca iva saḥ bhavam gotamaḥ ahosi jhānasīlī ca

original: Sabbañca pana so bhavaṁ gotamo jhānaṁ vaṇṇesī”ti.
analyzed: sabbam ca pana saḥ bhavam gotamaḥ jhānam vaṇṇesi iti

original: “Na ca kho, brāhmaṇa, so bhagavā sabbaṁ jhānaṁ vaṇṇesi, napi so bhagavā sabbaṁ jhānaṁ na vaṇṇesīti.
analyzed: na ca kho brāhmaṇa saḥ bhagavā sabbam jhānam vaṇṇesi na pi saḥ bhagavā sabbam jhānam na vaṇṇesi iti

original: Kathaṁ rūpañca, brāhmaṇa, so bhagavā jhānaṁ na vaṇṇesi?
analyzed: katham rūpam ca brāhmaṇa saḥ bhagavā jhānam na vaṇṇesi

original: Idha, brāhmaṇa, ekacco kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati kāmarāgaparetena, uppannassa ca kāmarāgassa nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti;
analyzed: idha brāhmaṇaḥ ekaccaḥ kāma rāga pariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati kāma rāga paretena uppannassa ca kāma rāgassa nissaraṇam yathābhūtam na pajānāti

original: so kāmarāgaṁyeva antaraṁ karitvā jhāyati pajjhāyati nijjhāyati apajjhāyati.
analyzed: saḥ kāma rāgayā iva antaram karitvā jhāyati pajjhāyati nijjhāyati apajjhāyati

original: Byāpādapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati byāpādaparetena, uppannassa ca byāpādassa nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti;
analyzed: byāpāda pariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati byāpāda paretena uppannassa ca byāpādassa nissaraṇam yathābhūtam na pajānāti

original: so byāpādaṁyeva antaraṁ karitvā jhāyati pajjhāyati nijjhāyati apajjhāyati.
analyzed: saḥ byāpādayā iva antaram karitvā jhāyati pajjhāyati nijjhāyati apajjhāyati

original: Thinamiddhapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati thinamiddhaparetena, uppannassa ca thinamiddhassa nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti;
analyzed: thinamiddha pariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati thinamiddha paretena uppannassa ca thinamiddhassa nissaraṇam yathābhūtam na pajānāti

original: so thinamiddhaṁyeva antaraṁ karitvā jhāyati pajjhāyati nijjhāyati apajjhāyati.
analyzed: saḥ thinam iddhayā iva antaram karitvā jhāyati pajjhāyati nijjhāyati apajjhāyati

original: Uddhaccakukkuccapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati uddhaccakukkuccaparetena, uppannassa ca uddhaccakukkuccassa nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti;
analyzed: uddhacca kukkucca pariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati uddhacca kukkucca paretena uppannassa ca uddhacca kukkuccassa nissaraṇam yathābhūtam na pajānāti

original: so uddhaccakukkuccaṁyeva antaraṁ karitvā jhāyati pajjhāyati nijjhāyati apajjhāyati.
analyzed: saḥ uddhacca kukkuccayā iva antaram karitvā jhāyati pajjhāyati nijjhāyati apajjhāyati

original: Vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati vicikicchāparetena, uppannāya ca vicikicchāya nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti;
analyzed: vicikicchā pariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati vicikicchā paretena uppannāya ca vicikicchāya nissaraṇam yathābhūtam na pajānāti

original: so vicikicchaṁyeva antaraṁ karitvā jhāyati pajjhāyati nijjhāyati apajjhāyati.
analyzed: saḥ vicikicchayā iva antaram karitvā jhāyati pajjhāyati nijjhāyati apajjhāyati

original: Evarūpaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, so bhagavā jhānaṁ na vaṇṇesi.
analyzed: evarūpam kho brāhmaṇa saḥ bhagavā jhānam na vaṇṇesi

original: Kathaṁ rūpañca, brāhmaṇa, so bhagavā jhānaṁ vaṇṇesi?
analyzed: katham rūpam ca brāhmaṇa saḥ bhagavā jhānam vaṇṇesi

original: Idha, brāhmaṇa, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: idha brāhmaṇa bhikkhu vivicca iva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi sa vitakkam sa vicāram viveka jam pīti sukham paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: Vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ …
analyzed: vitakka vicārānam vūpasamāḥ ajjhattam sampasādanam cetasaḥ eka udi bhāvam a vitakkam a vicāram samādhi jam pīti sukham dutiyam jhānam

original: tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ …
analyzed: tatiyam jhānam

original: catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: catuttham jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: Evarūpaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, so bhagavā jhānaṁ vaṇṇesī”ti.
analyzed: evarūpam kho brāhmaṇa saḥ bhagavā jhānam vaṇṇesi iti

original: “Gārayhaṁ kira, bho ānanda, so bhavaṁ gotamo jhānaṁ garahi, pāsaṁsaṁ pasaṁsi.
analyzed: gārayham kira bho ānanda saḥ bhavam gotamaḥ jhānam garahi pāsasam pasasi

original: Handa ca dāni mayaṁ, bho ānanda, gacchāma;
analyzed: handa ca dāni maya bho ānanda gacchāma

original: bahukiccā mayaṁ bahukaraṇīyā”ti.
analyzed: bahu kitcā mayam bahu karaṇīyā ati

original: “Yassadāni tvaṁ, brāhmaṇa, kālaṁ maññasī”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ sadāni tva brāhmaṇa kālam maññasi iti

original: Atha kho vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto āyasmato ānandassa bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha kho vassakāraḥ brāhmaṇaḥ magadha mahāmattaḥ āyasmataḥ ānandassa bhāsitam abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāya āsanā pakkāmi

original: Atha kho gopakamoggallāno brāhmaṇo acirapakkante vassakāre brāhmaṇe magadhamahāmatte āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu gopakamoggallānaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ acira pakkante vassakāre brāhmaṇe magadha mahāmatte āyasmantam ānandam etat avoca

original: “yaṁ no mayaṁ bhavantaṁ ānandaṁ apucchimhā taṁ no bhavaṁ ānando na byākāsī”ti.
analyzed: yam naḥ mayam bhavantam ānandam apucchimha tam naḥ bhavam ānandaḥ na byākāsi iti

original: “Nanu te, brāhmaṇa, avocumhā:
analyzed: nanu te brāhmaṇa avocumhā

original: ‘natthi kho, brāhmaṇa, ekabhikkhupi tehi dhammehi sabbenasabbaṁ sabbathāsabbaṁ samannāgato yehi dhammehi samannāgato so bhagavā ahosi arahaṁ sammāsambuddho.
analyzed: natthi kho brāhmaṇaḥ eka bhikkhu pi tehi dhammehi sabbena sabbam sabbathā sabbam samannāgataḥ yehi dhammehi samannāgataḥ saḥ bhagavā ahosi araham sammāsambuddho

original: So hi, brāhmaṇa, bhagavā anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā, asañjātassa maggassa sañjanetā, anakkhātassa maggassa akkhātā, maggaññū, maggavidū, maggakovido.
analyzed: saḥ hi brāhmaṇa bhagavā anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā a sañjātassa maggassa sañjanetā an akkhātassa maggassa akkhātā maggaññū magga vidū magga kovidaḥ

original: Maggānugā ca pana etarahi sāvakā viharanti pacchā samannāgatā’”ti.
analyzed: magga anugā ca pana etarahi sāvakāḥ viharanti pacchā samannāgatā ati

original: Gopakamoggallānasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ aṭṭhamaṁ.
analyzed: gopakamoggallāna suttam niṭṭhitam aṭṭhama
